message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take a slight majority, but it's a good starting point!
I'll compromise and give you a slight majority, but not too much!
I'll take a bigger majority, but I'm willing to compromise
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up too much!
I'll take a significant majority, but I'm willing to give you a token amount
Let's meet in the middle and split it almost 50/50!
